Sentencas: Autothermal reforming of methane couples exothermal partial oxidation of methane and endothermal steam or dry reforming of methane to achieve high energy efficiency, which can be operated through solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) so that expensive oxygen is not required and safety issue caused by CH4/O2 mixture is avoided.
Titulo: Autothermal reforming of methane over an integrated solid oxide fuel cell reactor for power and syngas co-generation

Sentencas: In addition, electric power is simultaneously generated.
Titulo: Autothermal reforming of methane over an integrated solid oxide fuel cell reactor for power and syngas co-generation

Sentencas: This study has demonstrated the efficient electrochemical autothermal reforming of methane over a SOFC reactor integrated with catalyst beds within anode channel structure.
Titulo: Autothermal reforming of methane over an integrated solid oxide fuel cell reactor for power and syngas co-generation

Sentencas: The catalyst bed reformer increases syngas yield by a factor of about 6 owing to the increased methane conversion and syngas selectivity.
Titulo: Autothermal reforming of methane over an integrated solid oxide fuel cell reactor for power and syngas co-generation

Sentencas: By numerical assessment, enhanced mass transportation is well validated by high fuel accessibility at the electrode-electrolyte interface benefiting from the integrated catalyst beds.
Titulo: Autothermal reforming of methane over an integrated solid oxide fuel cell reactor for power and syngas co-generation

Sentencas: Compared with conventional catalyst layer on anode surface, the catalyst beds are more efficient for conducting methane reforming.
Titulo: Autothermal reforming of methane over an integrated solid oxide fuel cell reactor for power and syngas co-generation

Sentencas: After the initial stabilization of cell microstructure, the SOFC reactor has demonstrated stable cell performance and syngas yield during the test for 120 h. The integrated SOFC reactor has demonstrated a promising application in performing catalytic reforming reactions.
Titulo: Autothermal reforming of methane over an integrated solid oxide fuel cell reactor for power and syngas co-generation
